resources.string: "An apple a day keeps the doctor away" is an old Welsh proverb that most of us are familiar with
Banana is one of a high caloried tropical fruits. 100 grams of its flesh carries 90 calories.
A cherry is the fruit of many plants of the genus Prunus, and is a fleshy drupe.
Lemon is a rich source of vitamin C, providing 64% of the Daily Value in a 100 g reference amount (table).
The orange is the fruit of the citrus species Citrus Ã— sinensis in the family Rutaceae, native to China.
The pineapple (Ananas comosus) is a tropical plant with an edible fruit, also called a pineapple, and the most economically significant plant in the family Bromeliaceae.
Watermelon (Citrullus lanatus) is a scrambling and trailing vine in the flowering plant family Cucurbitaceae.
